mapper.insert: insert into notice(notice_num, notice_title, notice_content, notice_views, notice_reco, notice_date, memberEmail, memberNickname) values(seq_notice_num.nextval, #{notice_title}, #{notice_content}, #{notice_views}, 0, sysdate, #{memberEmail}, #{memberNickname})
mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where notice_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title=#{notice_title}, notice_content=#{notice_content} where notice_num=#{notice_num}
update notice set notice_re_ref=notice_re_ref+1 where notice_re_ref=#{notice_re_ref} and notice_re_seq>#{notice_re_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from comlike where notice_num = #{notice_num} and memberEmail = #{memberEmail}
select count(*) from comlike where notice_num = #{notice_num} and likeN =#{likeN}
mapper.insert: insert into comlike (likenum ,notice_num , memberEmail,likeN) values((select * from (select NVL (max(likenum),0)+1 from comlike)), #{notice_num},#{memberEmail},1)
mapper.delete: delete from comlike where notice_num = #{notice_num} and memberEmail = #{memberEmail}
